page.title: 06Clubs + Recreation in Soham
page.content: The most popular clubs in Soham are the{Guides, Scouts and St. John's {Ambulance Brigade.}Other clubs include a{Youth Club, Fishing Club, Keep Fit, {Women's Institute}and various Social Clubs. Residents go outside the town to swimming and judo clubs, Farmer's Union and the Naturalist's Trust. Most people in Soham are satisfied with the range of clubs and leisure activities available, but the most common complaint was the lack of a public swimming pool. Many people would also enjoy a cinema, and also felt that more entertainment for teenagers would be beneficial.
